AttributeList.Text: MAIN Program Block (Release)
Network for detecting System Start-up.
System Startup
System Startup 2
Network for Calculating if Encoder on Axis 1 doesn't come under zero.
Axis 1- Enc2 Value
Network for Converting Axis 1 Encoder Dint Value to Real
Axis 1 - ConvDintToReal
Network for Overflow warning on Axis 1 encoder. Max Encoder value for Dint -2_107_529_216. It's enough for let de machine running for about 2 years. Then the encoder data wil overflow.
Axis 1 - Encoder Overflow Warning
Network for removing Drive enable when stop button is pressed during cycle.
Reset Cycle Pos Start
Spare Network Currently not used
Retain Veriables (Not Used)

Network for Safety Function Block. For Emergency Stop and Door contacts inputs. The Function config is as follows:
INPUTS: - ESB NC Contact is the NC Contact for the Emergency Stop Input - ESB NO Contact is the NO Contact for the Emergency Stop Input - Reset NO Contact is the NO Contact input for the Reset Button Input - SAFE Door 1 NC Contact is the NC Contact input for the Door Switch 1 (Currently not used in this Config) - SAFE Door 2 NC Contact is the NC Contact input for the Door Switch 2 (Currently not used in this Config) - Safety Relais NO Contact is the NO Contact Input for feedback whenether the Safety Relais is powered or not.
OUTPUTS: - SAFE_OK_Signal is the output for the SAFE OK signal, it's HIGH when all safety inputs are HIGH, en when Reset is given.
SAFETY
Network for internal SAFETY OK Confirmation
SAFE Signal
Function block for Emergency Stop Output to the Drives. Drives will turn in ES (External Stop or E-Stop)
Emergency Stop Drives

Function Block for System RUN, this will run the machine in automatic mode. Input config is as follows: - Safety Relais Contact - This input is for checking if the safety is oké, otherwise it's not possible to switch on the machine in automatic mode. - Stop Machine NC Contact is the Input for the Stop button. - Fill Magazine Contact is the input for the Magazine empty feedback error signal - This signal needs to be high, otherwise it's not possible to switch to automatic mode. - Start Machine NO Contact is the input for Start button.
Machine RUN

This function block start the infeed belt before there's program selection. This is configured because in this way it's possible to start the machine without program selection. So products are not getting stuck on the transistion between the production line and the machine infeed belt.
Start Infeed Belt Before Program Selection

This network manages the selection of Program 1. It's a bit unorganized, but i'll edited it later on. Important, the move posions are not used! Axis 3 uses the movve position from the PositionManagement DB instead of these parameters!!
+MC-21K11:5 - LED Programma 1

This network manages the selection of Program 2. It's a bit unorganized, but i'll edited it later on. Important, the move posions are not used! Axis 3 uses the movve position from the PositionManagement DB instead of these parameters!!
+MC-21K11:2 - LED Programma 2

This network manages the selection of Program 3. It's a bit unorganized, but i'll edited it later on. Important, the move posions are not used! Axis 3 uses the movve position from the PositionManagement DB instead of these parameters!!
+MC-21K11:6 - LED Programma 3
DONT DELETE! - This Function block is for setting the ouput decoupler on.
Set Auto & Manual Ouputs
This function block / program manages the Error warnings, both for the HMI and also the visual lights and beeping.
Audible & Visible Error Warning
This Function Block / Program is used for developing.
Other - Overrides
This Function Block / Program makes sure that all Drives and outputs are reset when System RUN is not enabled or Stop Machine Button is pressed. - It's made for max 5 outputs -
Reset Ouputs when SystemRUN is not active
This Function Block / Program is used for developing or testing.
SCL Testing block

This Function Block / Program Manages the Cleaning mode. It needs Safety high, and also the HMI NOT in manual control! This is important, otherwise it will be impossible to set drives because the're claimed by the manual controls.
Cleaning Program
This short code helps putting a short filter on Sensor of Axis 3.
Ref Switch Axis 3 - Delay Ref Switch
This short code helps putting a short filter on Sensor of Axis 3.
Ref Switch Axis 3 - Reset Ref Switch Temp
This short code helps putting a short filter on Sensor of Axis 3.
Ref Switch Axis 3 - RefTempSwtich
This is the Drive Manager function block, it controls the Asynchronous Servo Axis combined with an Siko IG06 Encoder. More about this can be found on the wiki page on Notion.
Drive Manager Axis 3
This Function Block/ Program is for the use of the Noodsleutel, when this input is HIGH, the infeed conveyorbelt is only turning.
Noodsleutel
This Function Block is used by all 3 of programs, just to set the get and drop positions of axis 3 to the Servo Drive Manager. I will try to add this on the wiki too.
MC_Move (Manual)
This Function Block is used for manual jogging of Axis 3
Drive 3 Jog
This is the Oldest version of the productBuffer it's not used anymore.
ProductBuffer - Old (Legacy)
This is Version 2 of the product buffer, and also not used anymore.
ProductBuffer V2 (Old - Don't use!)

This is the newest version of the Product Buffer, it's working great, and uses the encoder position of Axis 1 to ensure precise product place data. Switching between PB V2 and V3 can be done in the Automatiek Settings in the HMI, or manual trough tag M222.1
ProductBuffer V3 - Currently in production testing)
This Program ensures that when the machine is not in automatic mode, and the axis will always go to an safe position it will be done with a safe speed (25%)
Speed Select 25%
This program ensures that when the machine is in automatic mode, the speed will rise up to 75% what is 105-110 Hz on the Frequency Converter.
Speed Select 75%
This Function Block is for controlling and reading encoder data from the Axis 1 SIKO IG09 encoder. More can be found on the wiki.
Encoder Band Function Block

This program makes sure that when the E-Stop is pressed, the axis Has Reference flag is removed. It's done, because otherwise the Axis will lose position, due to the encoder position is set to zero locally on the PLC Card.
Reference Run Band (1)

This Program will demand Axis 1 to do an Reference run. It wil only turn about half a turn, to find the indexpuls of the encoder. For Axis 3 it's done with an external sensor. This Axis uses the internal indexpuls of the encoder. And that's because we're not going to control this Axis on position, but on velocity.
Reference Run Band (2)
This Program is for controlling the Z-pulse or Index Pulse of the Axis 1 Encoder.
Set Reference Sensor
This network is used for some internal use - Probably legacy ;)
Reference Run Band (3)
This network will read the PLC Uptime. It was used for timestamp purposes.
SystemTime
MAIN Program - Sweep
